channel.title: Gemini: Tween Edition
channel.itunes:author: WonderAI
channel.itunes:summary: Daily astrological guidance helps young Gemini girls in Santa Monica navigate friendships school and personal growth.
channel.description:
Join us for a daily cosmic journey designed especially for young Gemini girls in Santa Monica. Drawing from ancient astrological wisdom and modern-day insights, this podcast speaks directly to the unique experiences of tween Geminis navigating the complexities of friendship, school life, and personal growth. Each episode offers practical guidance and relatable stories that resonate with the distinctive Gemini spirit.
From managing busy schedules filled with activities to understanding changing emotions and friendships, we explore the daily challenges and triumphs of growing up under the influence of Mercury's dual nature. Our bite-sized episodes blend astrological perspectives with practical advice, helping young Geminis harness their natural curiosity and adaptability while finding their place in the world.
Disclaimer: This description is experimental and was generated by AI. It may contain factual errors.
